ONGOING - Rewrite precompiler cli with support for additional options
- Check whether "entry" and "exit" could perhaps be implemented using something similar to stacktrace.js: https://github.com/eriwen/javascript-stacktrace
- Check whether trace methods could perhaps issue the name of the function as well
- Think some more about logging context
- Add the possibility to compile custom builds
- Improve precompiler performances
- Add a playground to validate configuration

Menu:
1. Home
2. Getting started
3. Configuration
4. Precompilation
5. Download
6. Contributing

8. Changelog
